remarks: Get an upper bound on a concretely specified finite set.  Transfer boundedness to a subset.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Feb-2015.)
statement:
hashsslei.b $e |- B C_ A $.
hashsslei.a $e |- ( A e. Fin /\ ( # ` A ) <_ N ) $.
hashsslei.n $e |- N e. NN0 $.
hashsslei $p |- ( B e. Fin /\ ( # ` B ) <_ N ) $.
